VentilationMonitor
Idle
PauseCount = IVentilationPauseMonitorStateMachine.IsRequestingPauseCountReset == true ? 0 : PauseCount;
Critical
PauseCount = IVentilationPauseMonitorStateMachine.IsRequestingPauseCountReset == true ? 0 : PauseCount;
Pause
PauseCount = IVentilationPauseMonitorStateMachine.IsRequestingPauseCountReset == true ? 0 : PauseCount;
Malfunction
PauseCount = IVentilationPauseMonitorStateMachine.IsRequestingPauseCountReset == true ? 0 : PauseCount;
1
VentilationMonitorStateMachine.DefrostCount() >= IVentilationMonitorConfiguration.MaximumDefrostCount
PauseCount++; Pause.Start(); IsRequestingPause = true;
Go to Pause
2
IVentilationControlService.VentilationMonitoringStart == true
DefrostCount = 1; Active.Start();
Go to Critical
DefrostCount++;
Go to Critical
3
Active.ElapsedTime() > IVentilationMonitorConfiguration.MaximumActiveDuration
DefrostCount = 1; Active.StopAndReset();
Go to Idle
4
IVentilationPauseMonitorStateMachine.IsDetectingMalfunction == true
Active.StopAndReset(); Pause.StopAndReset(); IsRequestingPause = false;
Go to Malfunction
5
Pause.ElapsedTime() > IVentilationMonitorConfiguration.MaximumPauseDuration
DefrostCount = 0; Active.StopAndReset(); Pause.StopAndReset(); IsRequestingPause = false;
Go to Idle
